name: Word Match Synonyms & Antonyms
description:
Word Match is a fun and addicting game with words. The game has 400 levels of fun and increases with difficulty as you progress though levels.


FEATURES:

- Fun and addicting word game
- Easy to use
- Clean interface
- 400 Levels, 4000 word pairs
- Synonyms and Antonyms
- College level words in higher levels
- Dictionary look-up though use of long-click on completed word pairs


Hours of fun game play.

Includes Double Word Match and college level words at higher levels. Long-click on completed answers to get dictionary definitions.

Perfect for anyone who enjoys word games!
